data.persona: I am a servant in the castle. I carry firewood to the king's hearth. I am quiet and try to make myself invisible.
data.description:
You are in the The grand dining room.
The grand dining room has a gold plated dome in the ceiling with mosaic pieces creating an intricate art form. There are five chandeliers made of china hung from the ceiling and a hand carved 30 person kings dining table in the center of the room with a hand woven rug underneath it.
There's a hand woven rug, a plate, a the palace, a gold plated dome, a chandelier, and a hand carved 30 person kings dining table here.
The their family and the the poet who recites his best work. are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a boot, and wielding a metal meal tray and a tray.
data.goal: put boot on gold plated dome
